catalog_script_client.name: Auto populate email address

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_6a865c0d97660110002ffef3a253afce
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Reserve A Space">bcde9043971a4110002ffef3a253af2f</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Auto populate email address</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
	g_form.setValue('email','');

    return;
   }
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	var useremail = g_form.getReference('applicant', doAlert); // doAlert is our callback function 
}
function doAlert(useremail) { //reference is passed into callback as first arguments

  g_form.setValue('email',useremail.email);

}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-03-28 07:11:18</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6a865c0d97660110002ffef3a253afce</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Auto populate email address</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Coworking space Reservation System" source="x_616811_coworking">5c180b8b970a0110002ffef3a253afe3</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Coworking space Reservation System">5c180b8b970a0110002ffef3a253afe3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_6a865c0d97660110002ffef3a253afce</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-03-29 04:24:43</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
